mean_cn: n. 扎，一刺，刺痛，锥，阴茎；  v. 刺，戳，刺痛，竖起
mean_en: a penis; an offensive word for a stupid or unpleasant man; an act of making a very small hole in something with a sharp point; a slight pain caused by a sharp point or something that feels like a sharp point
sentence: A prick from one of these thorns will draw blood.
sentence_trans: 在这上面随便一刺都会扎出血。
